title: Salvia No Bouquet

status: サルビアのブーケ ; Sarubia no Buuke ; Bouquet of Salvia ; Ramo de Salvia
description:
Description :
        Ellen is an orphan, discovered for her talent in magic, she becomes an "Intern" and apprentice to the brilliant scholar of "magic," Liza. Despite the admiration Liza receives at the age of 16, she too was an orphan and shared the same loneliness as Ellen. Through the residential internship, these two gradually develop a warm bond while facing solitude.A comforting fantasy that connects lonely girls through "magic."
